title: Dolly Parton steps out in a form-fitting studded dress at the premiere Heartstrings
text:
Country music legend Dolly Parton stepped out in style at the premiere of her new Netflix movie Dolly Parton's Heartstrings.

The 73 year old singer was all smiles in a studded dress at the premiere held at her Dollywood estate in Pigeon Forge, Tennessee on Tuesday.

The singer and actress was joined by a number of her co-stars such as Sarah Shahi, Jaclyn Betham and Lucas Townsend at the premiere.

Legend: Country music legend Dolly Parton stepped out in style at the premiere of her new Netflix movie Dolly Parton's Heartstrings

Parton was wearing a form-fitting studded tan dress with a bejeweled rope belt around her waist.

She also wore dangling diamond earrings and several rings and necklaces as she stepped out on the red carpet.

The Nashville legend completed her look with a pair of tan open-toed platform pumps at the premiere.

Red carpet look: Parton was wearing a form-fitting studded tan dress with a bejeweled rope belt around her waist

Dolly Parton's Heartstrings tells eight stories, 'celebrating family, faith, forgiveness and more,' in the series inspired by Parton's iconic country music catalog.

Each episode will be adapted from a different Dolly Parton song, such as Jolene, Cracker Jack, Sugar Hill and Down from Dover, among others.

The cast includes characters from Parton's songs such as Jolene (Julianne Hough), with Parton playing her mother Babe.

Julianne's look: The cast includes characters from Parton's songs such as Jolene (Julianne Hough), with Parton playing her mother Babe

Dolly and Lucas: Dolly Parton's Heartstrings tells eight stories, 'celebrating family, faith, forgiveness and more,' in the series inspired by Parton's iconic country music catalog

Hough was also in attendance at the premiere, rocking a stunning white mini-dress with silver pumps and a white handbag.

Hough was also posing with her mother, Marianne, who was wearing a leopard print pant suit for the premiere.

jkl

Julianne and mom: Hough was also posing with her mother, Marianne, who was wearing a leopard print pant suit for the premiere

Other cast members in attendance were Sarah Shahi, who plays Lucy Jane in the Cracker Jack episode.

Also at the red carpet premiere was Willa Fitzgerald, who plays Maddie Hawkins in the J.J. Sneed episode.

Kimberly Williams-Paisley, who also stars in the Jolene episode, was also present on the red carpet.

Sarah's look: Other cast members in attendance were Sarah Shahi, who plays Lucy Jane in the Cracker Jack episode

Willa: Also at the red carpet premiere was Willa Fitzgerald, who plays Maddie Hawkins in the J.J. Sneed episode

Red carpet look: Kimberly Williams-Paisley, who also stars in the Jolene episode, was also present on the red carpet

Vanessa: Vanessa Rubio hits the red carpet
description: Country music legend Dolly Parton stepped out in style at the premiere of her new Netflix movie Dolly Parton's Heartstrings.
